text: Cold Case is the ninth album made by Swedish noise rock band Brainbombs. It was released on LP by Skrammel Records alongside a red translucent version. Skrammel Records also uploaded a video on their YouTube channel of the song "In Pain" in December of 2019. Daniel de Jongh for Discipline Magazine rated the album 15/20 in their "Top 20 Albums of 2020". == Track list == == References == Category:2020 albums Category:Brainbombs albums Category:Rock albums
title: Cold Case (Brainbombs album)
